content.rendered:
MinexCoin Price 2020

The current price of MinexCoin fluctuates around $0.040602; the total market capitalization is $248,691 or 31.76510123 BTC, which makes MinexCoin one of the 1250 most popular digital currencies as of January 2020. The circulating supply is 6,125,161 MNX, while the total supply is 6,518,843 MNX. The daily trading volume is around $43,733.89 or 5.58608990 BTC. The most active exchange that trades MNX is EXMO. 

The all-time high of MinexCoin, $70.31, was reached on December 3, 2017 – during the most famous cryptocurrency bull-run of Winter 2017-2018. On the other hand, the all-time low of MNX, $0.028670, occurred fairly recently on July 17, 2019. Currently, the estimated ROI (return on investment) of MinexCoin is -97.17%, which means that $100 worth of MNX bought at the time of the MinexCoin launch would not yield any profit today.

What is MinexCoin

MinexCoin (MNX) is a global blockchain-based payment system founded by a group of four Blockchain developers from Ukraine in 2016. The payment system is based on a low-volatility cryptocurrency, MNX, and operates within the Minex ecosystem. A unique characteristic of MinexCoin is a stable exchange rate, which renders MNX a reliable means of payment. The team also claims that the controllable growth of the MinexCoin price makes it a valuable tool for value storage.

The control over volatility and price growth is achieved by the system’s dedicated algorithm, which acts similarly to a central bank – hence the name, MinexBank. The financial instruments employed in the Minex ecosystem allow traders to earn from the exchange rate margin without damaging the ecosystem itself. 

The Minex Platform combines features of an online cryptocurrency exchange, an investment platform, and a safe and straightforward processing platform for cryptocurrency operations and online shopping. Another remarkable feature of MNX blockchain is the support of Atomic Swaps, which enable fast and reliable cross-chain transactions without a third party involved.

MinexCoin (MNX) Wallet
